subtitle: Sounds difficult but it is simple to make - especially if you have an electric mixer to whisk the egg whites. A great alternative to jacket potatoes and a clever way to use leftover mash.

method.text: Put the mashed potato into a bowl and stir in the egg yolks. Add the ham and tomato ketchup or relish to the mashed potato and mix well with a wooden spoon.
Whisk the egg whites until stiff. Using a tablespoon, fold the egg whites into the potato mixture.
Using the vegetable oil and a piece of absorbent kitchen paper, lightly oil the ramekin dishes and spoon in the mixture.
Bake for 20 min, until risen and golden brown.

title: Souffleed potatoes
